text: Romāns Apsītis (13 February 1939 – February 2022) was a Latvian lawyer and politician. He was a member of the Latvian Way. He was in the Saeima from 1993 to 1998 and was Minister of Justice from 1994 to 1995. Apsītis died in February 2022, at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Latvian politicians Category:European lawyers
title: Romāns Apsītis
